text: The 2003 Primera División de Chile season was both 73rd and 74th season of top-flight football in Chile. ==Torneo Apertura== The 2003 Campeonato Nacional Apertura Copa Banco del Estado was the 73rd Chilean League top flight tournament, in which Cobreloa won its sixth league title after eight years. ===Qualification stage=== ====Group standings==== ====Aggregate table==== Repechaje ===Playoffs=== ====First round==== ====Knockout stage==== ====Finals==== ===Top goalscorers=== ==Pre-Copa Sudamericana 2003 Tournament== ==Torneo Clausura== The 2003 Campeonato Nacional Clausura Copa Banco del Estado was the 74th Chilean League top flight tournament, in which Cobreloa won its seventh league title after beating Colo-Colo in the finals. ===Qualification stage=== ====Group standings==== ====Aggregate table==== ====Re-qualifier==== ===Playoffs=== ====First round==== ====Knockout stage==== ====Finals==== ===Top goalscorers=== ==References== ==External links== *RSSSF Chile 2003 Apertura
title: 2003 Primera División of Chile
